name: BTU Task Log Summary
query:
SELECT
	 TaskSchedule.name      AS "Schedule ID:Link/BTU Task Schedule:100"
	,TaskSchedule.task      AS "Task ID:Link/BTU Task:100"
	,TaskSchedule.task_description  AS "Task Description:Data:200"
	,TaskSchedule.schedule_description  AS "Schedule Description:Data:200"
	,drv1.date_time_started		AS "Last Run On:Data:150"
	,drv1.execution_time			AS "Last Duration (secs):Data:150"
	,drv1.success_fail			AS "Last Result:Data:150"
	,TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,drv1.date_time_started	,now())		AS "Hours Since Last:Data:150"
FROM
	`tabBTU Task Schedule`	AS TaskSchedule

LEFT JOIN	
	(
	SELECT schedule, date_time_started, execution_time, success_fail,
	ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY schedule, date_time_started DESC) - 
	RANK() OVER (ORDER BY schedule) 	AS occurrence
	
	FROM `tabBTU Task Log`	AS TaskLog
	) drv1
	
ON
	drv1.schedule = TaskSchedule.name
AND drv1.occurrence = 0
	
WHERE
	TaskSchedule.enabled = 1
